verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣סֶף <S%H3254><s%> again אִ֭יּוֹב <S%H347><s%> Moreover Job שְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H5375><s%> took מְשָׁל֗וֹ <S%H4912><s%> his parable וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתְּנֵ֥נִי <S%H5414><s%> Oh that כְיַרְחֵי־ <S%H3391><s%> I were as [in] months קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> past כִּ֝ימֵ֗י <S%H3117><s%> as [in] the days אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> [when] God יִשְׁמְרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H8104><s%> preserved

בְּהִלּ֣וֹ <S%H1984><s%> shined נֵ֭רוֹ <S%H5216><s%> When his candle עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> upon my head לְ֝אוֹרוֹ <S%H216><s%> [and when] by his light אֵ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> [through] darkness

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after הָ֭יִיתִי <S%H1961><s%> become בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> As I was in the days חָרְפִּ֑י <S%H2779><s%> of my youth בְּס֥וֹד <S%H5475><s%> when the secret אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> of God עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> over אָהֳלִֽי׃ <S%H168><s%> [was] upon my tabernacle

בְּע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> was yet שַׁ֭דַּי <S%H7706><s%> When the Almighty עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> against סְבִ֖יבוֹתַ֣י <S%H5439><s%> [were] about נְעָרָֽי׃ <S%H5288><s%> [was] yet with me [when] my children

בִּרְחֹ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> When I washed הֲלִיכַ֣י <S%H1978><s%> my steps בְּחֵמָ֑ה <S%H2529><s%> with butter וְצ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> and the rock יָצ֥וּק <S%H6694><s%> poured me out עִ֝מָּדִ֗י <S%H5978><s%> me פַּלְגֵי־ <S%H6388><s%> rivers שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> of oil

בְּצֵ֣אתִי <S%H3318><s%> When I went out שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> to the gate עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> of קָ֑רֶת <S%H7176><s%> through the city בָּ֝רְח֗וֹב <S%H7339><s%> in the street אָכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> [when] I prepared מוֹשָׁבִֽי׃ <S%H4186><s%> my seat

רָא֣וּנִי <S%H7200><s%> saw נְעָרִ֣ים <S%H5288><s%> The young men וְנֶחְבָּ֑אוּ <S%H2244><s%> me and hid וִֽ֝ישִׁישִׁים <S%H3453><s%> themselves and the aged קָ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> arose עָמָֽדוּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> [and] stood up

שָׂ֭רִים <S%H8269><s%> The princes עָצְר֣וּ <S%H6113><s%> refrained בְמִלִּ֑ים <S%H4405><s%> talking וְ֝כַ֗ף <S%H3709><s%> [their] hand יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and laid לְפִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> on their mouth

קוֹל־ <S%H6963><s%> their peace נְגִידִ֥ים <S%H5057><s%> The nobles נֶחְבָּ֑אוּ <S%H2244><s%> held וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <S%H3956><s%> and their tongue לְחִכָּ֥ם <S%H2441><s%> to the roof of their mouth דָּבֵֽקָה׃ <S%H1692><s%> cleaved

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when אֹ֣זֶן <S%H241><s%> When the ear שָׁ֭מְעָה <S%H8085><s%> heard וַֽתְּאַשְּׁרֵ֑נִי <S%H833><s%> [me] then it blessed וְעַ֥יִן <S%H5869><s%> me and when the eye רָ֝אֲתָ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> saw וַתְּעִידֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5749><s%> [me] it gave witness

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אֲ֭מַלֵּט <S%H4422><s%> Because I delivered עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the poor מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <S%H7768><s%> that cried וְ֝יָת֗וֹם <S%H3490><s%> and the fatherless וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had no עֹזֵ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> and [him that had] none to help לֽוֹ׃

בִּרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> The blessing אֹ֭בֵד <S%H6><s%> of him that was ready to perish עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and תָּבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> came וְלֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> heart אַלְמָנָ֣ה <S%H490><s%> upon me and I caused the widow's אַרְנִֽן׃ <S%H7442><s%> to sing for joy

צֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> on righteousness לָ֭בַשְׁתִּי <S%H3847><s%> I put וַיִּלְבָּשֵׁ֑נִי <S%H3847><s%> and it clothed כִּמְעִ֥יל <S%H4598><s%> [was] as a robe וְ֝צָנִ֗יף <S%H6797><s%> and a diadem מִשְׁפָּטִֽי׃ <S%H4941><s%> me my judgment

עֵינַ֣יִם <S%H5869><s%> I was eyes הָ֭יִיתִי <S%H1961><s%> become לַֽעִוֵּ֑ר <S%H5787><s%> to the blind וְרַגְלַ֖יִם <S%H7272><s%> and feet לַפִּסֵּ֣חַ <S%H6455><s%> [was] I to the lame אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> I [was] a father אָ֭נֹכִֽי <S%H595><s%> I לָֽאֶבְיוֹנִ֑ים <S%H34><s%> to the poor וְרִ֖ב <S%H7379><s%> and the cause לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> [which] I knew אֶחְקְרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2713><s%> not I searched out

וָֽ֭אֲשַׁבְּרָה <S%H7665><s%> And I brake מְתַלְּע֣וֹת <S%H4973><s%> the jaws עַוָּ֑ל <S%H5767><s%> of the wicked וּ֝מִשִּׁנָּ֗יו <S%H8127><s%> out of his teeth אַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> and plucked טָֽרֶף׃ <S%H2964><s%> the spoil

וָ֭אֹמַר <S%H559><s%> Then I said עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in קִנִּ֣י <S%H7064><s%> in my nest אֶגְוָ֑ע <S%H1478><s%> I shall die וְ֝כַח֗וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand אַרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> and I shall multiply יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> [my] days

שָׁרְשִׁ֣י <S%H8328><s%> My root פָת֣וּחַ <S%H6605><s%> [was] spread out אֱלֵי־ <S%H413><s%> to מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> by the waters וְ֝טַ֗ל <S%H2919><s%> and the dew יָלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> lay all night בִּקְצִירִֽי׃ <S%H7105><s%> upon my branch

כְּ֭בוֹדִי <S%H3519><s%> My glory חָדָ֣שׁ <S%H2319><s%> [was] fresh עִמָּדִ֑י <S%H5978><s%> in me וְ֝קַשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H7198><s%> and my bow בְּיָדִ֥י <S%H3027><s%> in my hand תַחֲלִֽיף׃ <S%H2498><s%> was renewed
לִֽי־ שָׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Unto me [men] gave ear וְיִחֵ֑לּוּ <S%H3176><s%> and waited וְ֝יִדְּמ֗וּ <S%H1826><s%> and kept silence לְמ֣וֹ <S%H3926><s%> at עֲצָתִֽי׃ <S%H6098><s%> my counsel

אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> After דְ֭בָרִי <S%H1697><s%> my words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יִשְׁנ֑וּ <S%H8138><s%> they spake not again וְ֝עָלֵ֗ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> and תִּטֹּ֥ף <S%H5197><s%> dropped מִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H4405><s%> and my speech

וְיִֽחֲל֣וּ <S%H3176><s%> And they waited כַמָּטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> for me as for the rain לִ֑י וּ֝פִיהֶ֗ם <S%H6310><s%> their mouth פָּעֲר֥וּ <S%H6473><s%> and they opened לְמַלְקֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H4456><s%> wide [as] for the latter rain

אֶשְׂחַ֣ק <S%H7832><s%> [If] I laughed אֲ֭לֵהֶם <S%H413><s%> about לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יַאֲמִ֑ינוּ <S%H539><s%> on them they believed וְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> [it] not and the light פָּ֝נַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> of my countenance לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יַפִּילֽוּן׃ <S%H5307><s%> they cast not down

אֶֽבֲחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> I chose דַּרְכָּם֮ <S%H1870><s%> out their way וְאֵשֵׁ֪ב <S%H3427><s%> and sat רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> chief וְ֭אֶשְׁכּוֹן <S%H7931><s%> and dwelt כְּמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> as a king בַּגְּד֑וּד <S%H1416><s%> in the army כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אֲבֵלִ֣ים <S%H57><s%> the mourners יְנַחֵֽם׃ <S%H5162><s%> as one [that] comforteth
